title: The Wash Trolls by Thomas Graham
description: The Wash Trolls by Thomas Graham. Read by Neet Mohan from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and Under category.
